definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Old Mother Adams next door couldn't pierce her daughter's thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 隔壁的亞當斯老大媽看不透女兒的心思。

definition: Jixi county in Xuancheng 宣城[Xuan1 cheng2], Anhui
lit. to hang a sheep's head while selling dog meat (idiom)/fig. to cheat/dishonest advertising/wicked deeds carried out under banner of virtue
pinyin: gua4 yang2 tou2 mai4 gou3 rou4

definition: Xihua county in Zhoukou 周口[Zhou1 kou3], Henan
villains collude together (idiom); to work hand in glove with sb (to nefarious ends)
to judge between right and wrong/to reason things out
sudden thrust (that catches the opponent off guard)
Zhong county in Wanzhou suburbs of north Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
